scripts.build: tailwind build ../static/css/tailwind.css -o ../static/css/tailwind-output.css && cleancss -o ../static/css/tailwind-output.min.css ../static/css/tailwind-output.css && cleancss -o ../static/css/app.min.css ../static/css/app.css && cleancss -o ../static/css/lightbox.min.css ../static/css/lightbox.css && cleancss -o ../static/css/modest.min.css ../static/css/modest.css
